PSoC 6 Peripheral Driver Library
Enumerations
Trigger Mutiplexer Outputs
TrigMux (Trigger Multiplexer) » Enumerated Types

General Description

Enumerations

enum  en_trig_output_pdma0_tr_t
 For PERI_ver2: the enumerated type that represents a trigger multiplexer group #0 output signals, used by Cy_TrigMux_Connect, Cy_TrigMux_SwTrigger and Cy_TrigMux_SetDebugFreeze functions. Refer to a family-specific device header file, e.g. <PDL_DIR>/devices/include/psoc6_02_config.h.
 
enum  en_trig_output_pdma1_tr_t
 For PERI_ver2: the enumerated type that represents a trigger multiplexer group #1 output signals, used by Cy_TrigMux_Connect, Cy_TrigMux_SwTrigger and Cy_TrigMux_SetDebugFreeze functions. Refer to a family-specific device header file, e.g. <PDL_DIR>/devices/include/psoc6_02_config.h.

 For PERI_ver2: the enumerated type that represents a trigger multiplexer group #2 output signals, used by Cy_TrigMux_Connect, Cy_TrigMux_SwTrigger and Cy_TrigMux_SetDebugFreeze functions. Refer to a family-specific device header file, e.g. <PDL_DIR>/devices/include/psoc6_02_config.h.
